main module¶

Main file that defines the Flask backend and all the routes

main.create_game()¶

Create X amount of games for a certain instructor

main.create_instructor()¶

Create a instructor via query string parameters.

main.login_check()¶

Check for instructor login

main.make_distributor_order(game_id)¶

Order from distributor

main.make_factory_order(game_id)¶

Order from factory

main.make_retailer_order(game_id)¶

Order from retailer

main.make_wholesaler_order(game_id)¶

Order from wholesaler

main.student_login_check()¶

Check for student login
